meanings.definition: The quality of being shrewd and knowledgeable in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: Her savviness in business allowed her to make wise decisions.
meanings.sent2: His savviness in technology helped him fix the computer issue quickly.
meanings.sent3: With her savviness in cooking, she turned simple ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: His savviness in negotiation was like a sharp blade cutting through the confusion.
meanings.sent5: The detective's savviness in solving mysteries was unmatched in the town.

meanings.definition: The ability to understand and navigate a situation effectively.
meanings.sent1: His savviness in social settings made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: She showed great savviness in handling the difficult conversation with ease.
meanings.sent3: The cat's savviness in finding hidden treats amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her savviness in finding shortcuts saved her a lot of time during the commute.
meanings.sent5: The captain's savviness in steering the ship through the storm saved them from disaster.
